channel.title: Need a logo
channel.description:
Hello Well Im looking for a logo for my site runefantasy, Well here is a little information that can help someone out First of All... I want it to be used by photoshop please, no gimp or paint- i want it to look proffesional. I want the theme to be a fantasy thing, like with knights or castles- something that has to do with fantasy I am not going to be too picky on the background color- but i would hope it is like black and navy or dark blue- maybe a little white- not completely black and blue- but put some in there, maybe a little white to make it look nice- blend the colors or something :) The Text should be pretty simple, I want it to say Runefantasy in white letters- dont have to glow or something- just white colors saying Runefantasy- maybe in some cool font like cursive or something- dont be plain. I will hope to see some renders of knights or things that have to do with a castle theme- not halo knight or call of duty soldier- a knight like a knight with shiny armor- maybe a castle in the background The size should be not too big- but not to small, I dont want it like the mopar one- maybe something like this big
[IMG]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg154/anarkiamx/Untitled-4-1.jpg[/img]
if you need any more information- please reply I hope there is a good logo in the end :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2008, 06:42:03 PM[/size][hr]im sorry but is no1 replying because they cant help me, or is it because im just simply not popular as other players who request here are

item.title: Need a logo
item.dc:creator: @anarkia anarkia
item.description:
@anarkia wrote:

[quote=“Cain_”][quote author=anarkia link=topic=277350.msg2262467#msg2262467 date=1212828365]

OMG THAT LOOKS AWESOME

Seriously the best sig i ever seen, but you think you can make something with blue also so it can match the forums? but seriously if its too much in a burden- i thank you alot for this awesome picture

I guess you haven’t seen much

i know your a graphics mod- but i havent seen you try to help me…
[/quote]

use correct grammar “you’re a graphics mod” not “your a graphics mod”.[/quote]

dude leave me alone- stop spamming my thread with random offtopic… stay on topic- this thread is only for people who want to help me- not for people who want to be geeks and correct every single mistake i make

Read full topic

item.title: Need a logo
item.dc:creator: @anarkia anarkia
item.description:
@anarkia wrote:

Hello Well Im looking for a logo for my site runefantasy,

Well here is a little information that can help someone out

First of All… I want it to be used by photoshop please, no gimp or paint- i want it to look proffesional.

I want the theme to be a fantasy thing, like with knights or castles- something that has to do with fantasy

I am not going to be too picky on the background color- but i would hope it is like black and navy or dark blue- maybe a little white- not completely black and blue- but put some in there, maybe a little white to make it look nice- blend the colors or something

The Text should be pretty simple, I want it to say Runefantasy in white letters- dont have to glow or something- just white colors saying Runefantasy- maybe in some cool font like cursive or something- dont be plain.

I will hope to see some renders of knights or things that have to do with a castle theme- not halo knight or call of duty soldier- a knight like a knight with shiny armor- maybe a castle in the background

The size should be not too big- but not to small, I dont want it like the mopar one- maybe something like this big

[IMG]http://i247.photobucket.com/albums/gg154/anarkiamx/Untitled-4-1.jpg[/img]

if you need any more information- please reply

I hope there is a good logo in the end :)[br][br][size=1]Posted on: June 05, 2008, 06:42:03 PM[/size][hr]im sorry but is no1 replying because they cant help me, or is it because im just simply not popular as other players who request here are
